title: Bootstrap Dropdowns
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Toggleable Context Menus
Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays.

### Components
1. `.dropdown`: Wrapper.
2. `.dropdown-toggle`: The Button.
3. `.dropdown-menu`: The hidden list.
4. `.dropdown-item`: Links inside.

### JS Requirement
Requires Popper.js (included in bundle).
